1.14.0 
⸻ 

Some small improvements to follow Googles latest Material Design 3 guideline. 

Updated translations. Thanks to all people who are helping! 

Various stability improvements. 
 
1.13.0 
⸻ 

Another new language: You can now enjoy the app in Arabic. Thanks a lot, Ahmed!
🇦🇪🇧🇭🇩🇯🇩🇿🇪🇬🇪🇭🇪🇷🇮🇱🇮🇶🇯🇴🇰🇲🇰🇼🇱🇧🇱🇾🇲🇦🇲🇷🇴🇲🇶🇦🇸🇦🇸🇩🇸🇴🇸🇸🇸🇾🇹🇩🇹🇳🇾🇪 

Some more RTL fixes for the landscape layout. 

Fixed a crash when entering an empty value for the fee amount. 

The data provider is being displayed in the timeline view. 
 
1.12.1 
⸻ 

Fix crash on refreshing rates. Sorry! 🤕 
 
1.12.0 
⸻ 

This release fixes several layout problems with right-to-left (RTL) languages. Now, everything should look as expected. 

New feature: Preview all conversions in the currency picker. You have to enable it in the settings. 

Sometimes, currencies would show old or wrong data after a rate refresh. This is fixed. 

Really a lot of code improvements, to make this app even better. 
 
1.11.0 
⸻ 

You're now able to pull-to-refresh to update the rates. 

Much improved feedback when refreshing rates and in case of errors. 

New language: A kind community member provided translations for Turkish. Thank you! 🇹🇷 

In some situations, the wrong API was used for the timeline. That is fixed, now. 
 
1.10.3 
⸻ 

Minor improvements. 
 
1.10.2 
⸻ 

Fixed a crash when opening the preferences. 
 
1.10.1 
⸻ 

Fixed a crash on Android 8.0. 

Updated translations. 

Small UI improvements. 
 
1.10.0 
⸻ 

You're now able to favorite currencies for a quicker access. Have fun! ❤ 

Added option for a pure black theme experience, when using dark mode. 

Updated translations. Thanks a lot to the volunteers! 
 
1.9.0 
⸻ 

New localization: The app also speaks Greek, now. 🇬🇷 
 
1.8.1 
⸻ 

Fixed an error where the app would crash in some cases, when the dark theme is used. 
 
1.8.0 
⸻ 

Improved the display of exchange rate age. 

Added a preference entry to rate the app on Google Play (not in the F-Droid version, of course). 

Yet another localization: the app is now translated to Vietnamese. 🇻🇳 

Small minor improvements. 
 
1.7.0 
⸻ 

Enjoy some big new feature in this release! 
Most notably, this app now includes historic rates. Check out the chart for the past year, to see how the currencies have developed. 

There's also an additional exchange rate provider: You can now choose fer.ee in the settings. A relatively new service, that behaves basically like frankfurter.app and is just one more choice for you. 

As always, this release includes updated libraries, small improvements and all the stuff that makes it even better. 
 
1.6.0 
⸻ 

Thanks to the support of awesome community members, this app is now not only localized in English and German, but also Spanish 🇪🇸, French 🇫🇷, Italian 🇮🇹 and Norwegian (Bokmål) 🇳🇴. Thanks so much for your help! 🙏🙏🙏 

Small under-the-hood updates to make the app even more reliable. 
 
1.5.1 
⸻ 

Fixes a bug where the rates wouldn't update, when exchangerate.host is used. 

Library updates to improve stability and performance. 
 
1.5.0 
⸻ 

Select between two API providers: exchangerate.host and frankfurter.app 

You can now support the developer by donating with PayPal. Find the link in the settings. (F-Droid version only.) 

More UI improvements 
 
1.4.1 
⸻ 

UI improvements 
 
1.4.0 
⸻ 

It is now possible to manually refresh the rates. Check it out in the overflow menu. 

Performance improvements 
 
1.3.0 
⸻ 

So many more currencies! Over 160 in total, now!! That's because Currencies switched to a different API. The old one (exchangeratesapi.io) changed to a subscription model without any prior warning. NOT GOOD! Our new provider will be exchangerate.host. 

That also means, that the last couple of days, the exchange rates couldn't be refreshed. That's fixed now, of course. 

Also, the refresh process itself got improved, so at least next time something like that happens, you'll get a notice. 

Small UI improvements 
 
1.2.0 
⸻ 

17 new currencies! That's now 50 in total. 🥳 Too many to name them all. However, a lot of popular vacation destinations in the middle east and the caribbean are now included: UAE, Qatar, Barbados, Bahamas, Cuba, … 

To stay on top of all those new choices, a search is now available in the currency picker. 

The picker now also shows a currency's full name, not only its code. An awesome addition, in combination with the search. Try it out!

Minor improvements (typo 'n stuff) 
 
1.1.0 
⸻ 

Depending on your credit card agreement, your bank may charge a fee on all foreign exchange transactions.
You can now include that fee in the calculations, so you know how much you really pay. 🙂
